name: Shrouded in Sanity: Freebirth
description: Free version of Shrouded in Sanity. Discover the secrets of the estate, as you look for answers among the violent inhabitants. Servants roaming the halls will attack on sight, for a strange and repelling madness took hold... one rooted in a deeper understanding of cosmic insignificance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB RAM on Desktop, 1GB on certain Laptops. Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Widescreen capable monitor required.
